name: Animalia (IcefoxZettai)
description:
Animalia is a turn-based point & click exploration game, where you will mix and match different creature parts to fight mysterious beasts.

You wake up to the sound of a storm in a mysterious mansion, will you be able to escape? Explore the map, find key pieces and increase your life while you encounter different combination of creatures, find the best combination to deal with each one.


UPDATES:
  • v1.1: Dialog texts updated.
Credits:
  • Developing/Programming/Art: Icefox 
  • Dialog Proofreading: Zero_Vectra
  • Music: Rest!
  • Beasts SFX: Riria/Ririsaurus
